cause.description:
SmartPower is a national, non-profit, and non-partisan marketing organization.
We are leading the effort to promote clean energy – electricity from sources such as wind, solar and water. It’s our mission to have 20% of the energy supply come from clean, renewable sources by 2010.
YOU can show the 2008 Presidential Candidates that YOU care about Clean Energy, Energy Independence, and Global Warming by signing SmartPower's
"DECLARATION OF ENERGY INDEPENDENCE."
Visit www.SmartPower.org to sign your name to the Declaration of Energy Independence!
Clean Energy: It's Real, It's Here, and It's Working! Let's Make More!
1. Clean Energy is real, it's here & it's working.
2. Using Clean Energy helps our environment.
3. Using Clean Energy makes America less dependent on foreign fossil fuels.
cause.mission: Promoting Clean, Renewable, Energy & Energy Efficiency
